identifier.title: Used as filename or fragment reference
identifier.description: Common name; lowercased; used for lookups.

description.title: Description
description.description: One sentence brief overview of organization.

slogan.title: slogan
slogan.description: A slogan or motto associated with the organization.

masthead.title: masthead
masthead.description: Link to the masthead page or a page listing top editorial management.

contactPoint.title: Contact Point
contactPoint.description: Contact point or tipline for the organization.

location.title: Location
location.description: Country or specific location organization is based.

areaServed.title: Area Served
areaServed.description: Geographic area of news coverage or focus.

boardSize.title: Board Size
boardSize.description: Number of board of director seats.

boardType.title: Board Type
boardType.description: Approximate type of board: (non-paid) member elected; (paid) sponsor elected; appointed; etc.

membershipType.title: Membership Type
membershipType.description: Note if a membership corporation, or a non-member corporation nonprofit.

numberOfEmployees.title: Approx Number Of Paid Staff
numberOfEmployees.description: Approximate number of paid employees or equivalents.

taxID.title: Tax Authority ID
taxID.description: US IRS taxID, or other country's tax identifier (if any).

taxIDLocal.title: Local Tax Authority ID
taxIDLocal.description: Local taxID, for example MA AG Account Number (if any).

nonprofitStatus.title: Nonprofit Type
nonprofitStatus.description: Specific type of non-profit; US or other country type.

funding.title: Funding Sources
funding.description: Primary funding sources in rough order: (corporate) sponsors; (individual) donations; grants; other.

budgeturl.title: Budget Website
budgeturl.description: Official budget or other financial information URL.

budgetTransparent.title: Budget Transparency
budgetTransparent.description: Is the official budget shared publicly and fully, or is it opaque?

donateurl.title: Donation Website
donateurl.description: Donation or other giving page (typically for nonprofits).

sponsorurl.title: Sponsor List Website
sponsorurl.description: Official listing of sponsors, corporate supporters, or other major funders URL.

sponsorList.title: Example Sponsors
sponsorList.description: Example listing of top-level annual recurring sponsors.

ownershipFundingInfo.title: Ownership Structure
ownershipFundingInfo.description: description of organizational ownership structure; funding and grants. In a news/media setting, this is with particular reference to editorial independence.

ethicsPolicy.title: Ethics/COI Policy
ethicsPolicy.description: Statement describing the personal, organizational, and corporate standards of behavior expected by the organization.

correctionsPolicy.title: Corrections Policy
correctionsPolicy.description: Statement describing (in news media, the newsroomâ€™s) disclosure and correction policy for errors.

publishingPrinciples.title: Publishing Principles
publishingPrinciples.description: Indicates (typically via URL) a document describing the editorial principles of an Organization (or individual, e.g. a Person writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies..

unnamedSourcesPolicy.title: Unnamed Sources Policy
unnamedSourcesPolicy.description: Statement about policy on use of unnamed sources and the decision process required.

diversityPolicy.title: Diversity Policy Website
diversityPolicy.description: Diversity, inclusion, or other related policies or informational page.

advertising.title: Advertising Policy
advertising.description: Policy or other information about advertising, sponsorship, or similar.

foundingDate.title: Founding Date
foundingDate.description: Date organization was legally incorporated (or similar).

parentOrganization.title: Parent Organization
parentOrganization.description: Legal organization or corporation this organization belongs to.
